Text:

Can you upload Nine Brrip please...........

because I cannot speak na'vi therefore subtitles are good.

i needs help getting the subs to work for VLC -.-
click video, click subtitle track, select track 1.
For some reason it doesn't work on the Xbox. Do I need to use mp4demux to take out the ac3 track?
Nah man I can't get this to work on the Xbox. I tried demuxing it and it still wont play. Any suggestions?
it will need to be streamed, it wont work because its over 4gb and your drive will not hold it.
I even tried burning it to a disc and it still didn't work. Damn, I wanna see this in BR, my PC will never run this. Thanks anyway man.
you can remux it and remove the ac3 track and it will be fine.
I tried that and it still didn't work. I even removed the subtitle track as well.
PT, where is the torrent to download just the revised AC3 track?
